meanings.definition: Improvised or makeshift solution or repair
meanings.sent1: The kluged fix held the broken chair together.
meanings.sent2: He used a kluged solution to patch up the leaky roof.
meanings.sent3: The kluged repair job on the fence made it look like a quirky art piece.
meanings.sent4: Her kluged solution to the problem was like a puzzle with mismatched pieces.
meanings.sent5: The kluged repair stood out with its unique charm.

meanings.definition: To put together or create in a makeshift or improvised way
meanings.sent1: She kluged together a makeshift shelter using branches and leaves.
meanings.sent2: They kluged a plan to escape from the locked room.
meanings.sent3: He kluged a costume for the school play out of random items in his closet.
meanings.sent4: The team kluged a strategy to win the game at the last minute.
meanings.sent5: Kluging a solution quickly became his specialty.
